MACRO_CHECK_SHOULD_BUILD(rdf)

IF(rdf_SHOULD_BUILD)
  MESSAGE(STATUS "-DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DLIBRDFA_IN_RAPTOR -DRAPTOR_INTERNAL=1")
  ADD_DEFINITIONS("-DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DLIBRDFA_IN_RAPTOR -DRAPTOR_INTERNAL=1")
  FILE(GLOB_RECURSE
    rdf_SRC
    RELATIVE
    "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}"
    "*.c"
    "*.cc"
    )
  INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
    ${xml2_INCLUDE_DIRS}
    ${Boost_INCLUDE_DIRS}
    ${IZENELIB_SOURCE_DIR}/include/3rdparty/rdf
    )

  MACRO_ADD_LIBRARY(rdf SRCS ${rdf_SRC})
  TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(rdf
    xslt
#     curl
    )
ENDIF(rdf_SHOULD_BUILD)
